title: Polynomial Functions - Describing Characteristics - Part C

content.question: Part C What is the maximum number of non-real zeros possible for the function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>f</mi> </math> ? Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Part C What is the maximum number of non-real zeros possible for the function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>f</mi> </math> ? Give a reason for your answer.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
